report the interview is right there you

Green he is moving forward with the vote
to impeach Trump now 58 House Democrats
voted to impeach Trump and the vote has
failed and we can see right now that
this was never going to happen there are
no grounds for impeachment and this
whole thing it just didn't work in a 364
to 58 vote lawmakers tabled the
impeachment resolution from green and we
can see right now this is done here now
we know the corporate media is making a
very big deal about Flynn speaking to
the Russians and of course this isn't
what he was brought up on charges about
it was he was brought up on charges
about lying because as we said before
other individuals who are coming into
the White House where they were just
elected in their part of administration
they needed to speak to diplomats in

there are many individuals coming out
saying yeah this is
absolutely normal Jack Matlock the four
year four year US ambassador to the
Soviet Union from 1987 and 1991 at the
time that the USSR fell rights the
following as one who spent a 35-year
diplomatic career working to open up the
Soviet Union and to make communication
between our diplomats and ordinary
citizens in normal practice
I find the attitude of much of our

once respected media outlets quite
incomprehensible what in the world is
wrong with consulting a foreign embassy
about ways to improve relations anyone
who aspires to advise an American
president should just do that michael
mcdowell the US ambassador to Russia
under President Obama also confirms that
the Russian ambassador's contacts with
the US officials under an incoming

normal for presidential candidates to

al-maliki and Israeli prime minister
who'd Albert and we can see right now
this isn't the problem
this isn't Russian collusion this is why
they couldn't bring Flynn up on these
charges because there's nothing there
now what's very interesting is that the

where they're out there saying that he

they're maneuvering all around North

trying to provoke North Korea and we see

now before Trump went ahead and did this
he spoke to many different leaders now
of course many presidents before him did

and we need to look closely at this to

we'll say jewelz Jerusalem is the

now Trump might be controlled by Israel
don't get me wrong here where he's

under international law and with Russia

this was just not done just just to do

from what I'm saying it looks like there
there were deals that were put into

need that little control
to keep Israel you know in line or

oh no they're completely controlled but

maybe the Middle East will break out in

there'll be no war with Iran you're not

manufacturing is apocalyptic and all of

as the corporations I mean the country

currency give yourself more and more

we're very close to it and as more
